hero.tagline: Music that matches your rhythm — and keeps you in flow.
hero.subnote: Listen anywhere. Use the app when you want the experience to feel perfectly synced to you.

how.title: How it works
how.lead: Heartbeatz matches music to your pace — simple and smooth.

step1.title: 1. Connect (phone / Apple Watch)
step1.body: Start a session on your phone or watch — Heartbeatz reads your cadence.

step2.title: 2. Move at your pace
step2.body: As your tempo changes, the music follows — no fiddling required.

step3.title: 3. Save favorites
step3.body: Save tracks you love and build your workout soundtrack over time.

listen.title: Listen
listen.body: Stream Heartbeatz on your favorite platform.

download.title: App
download.body: Heartbeatz is free. Store links will appear when we’re ready.
